data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Cavite to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cavite, Philippines
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Cavite, Philippines to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 2,575,134 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Cavite, Philippines to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Cavite, Philippines. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Jama Mapun, Bajau Kagayan people.
Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Cavite.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Cavite. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.section_summary:
the state of Cavite, Philippines has a population of 2,991,900.

We estimate Cavite has 416,766 people who might know Jesus, 2,304,825 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 270,309 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Cavite, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.
